document.full_text: a moderate republican, senator richard g. lugar is running on the bet that the tea party's call of alarm has drowned out a majority of republicans who specialize in reaching across the aisle.
document.title: running on moderation in immoderate times
lines_and_colors: a moderate republican, senator richard g. lugar is running on the bet that the tea party's call of alarm has drowned out a majority of republicans who specialize in reaching across the aisle.
